description:
Advanced multi-source music streaming + discovery client for desktop. Free, clean, no login, no ads.

muffon is a cross-platform music streaming client for desktop, which helps you listen to, discover and organize music in an advanced way.
It retrieves audio, video and metadata from various Internet sources, such as:
- Last.FM
- VK
- Odnoklassniki
- Yandex Music
- Spotify
- Bandcamp
- Deezer
- SoundCloud
- YouTube Music
- YouTube
- Discogs
- Genius
- MusixMatch
- MusicBrainz
Languages
- Add Brazilian Portuguese language (@ivangomes)
- Add Turkish language (@chunsal, @Kadayif35)
Changes / Improvements
- Add player's seeker bar to Discord Rich Presence
- Add "Save browser history" option
- Add "Save player history" option
- Add "Save activity history" option
- Add logic for resize of main / about windows on scale change
- Add profile's role label to post's / comment's profile nickname section
- Add scale to equalizer bars
Fixes
- Fix bug when browser tab's ticker wasn't working when hovering some tab areas
- Fix wrong border color of checkboxes in active / focused state
- Fix wrong formatting of results in search import modals
- Fix bug when followers / following counters on profile page had no format
- Fix missing / wrong translations
- Fix bug when home page was loading infinitely after visiting another loading page
Security
- Fix XSS vulnerability issue
